name: Notice Bar
author: WEN Solutions

sections.description:
Notice bar is simple but powerful plugin to create and display custom Notice bars in WordPress websites. It helps website admins to effectively convey notices, information & messages to their visitors swiftly. With user friendly interface, tons of options to toggle and multiple notice types, Notice Bar is undoubtedly one of best notice bar plugin for WordPress websites.

Some Useful Links

  • Plugin : Homepage
  • Support Forum
sections.installation:
Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  3. Select notice-bar.zip from your computer
  4. Click ‘Install Now’
  5. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download notice-bar.zip
  2. Extract the notice-bar directory to your computer
  3. Upload the notice-bar directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
sections.changelog:
3.1.3

Release Date: 12th April, 2024

  • Fixed plugin general errors
  • Fixed Plugin security errors
  • Compatibility tested with WordPress 6.5

3.1.2

Release Date: 15th January, 2024

  • Fixed select input width issue.
  • Fixed date picker dackground issue.

3.1.1

Release Date: 25th July, 2023

  • Fixed escaping issue.
  • Fixed translation issue.

3.1.0

Release Date: 7th July, 2023

  • Compatibility tested with WordPress 6.2.
  • Fixed slides notice issue
    • arrow issue
    • content display issue

3.0.0

Release Date: 22nd June, 2022

  • Compatibility tested with WordPress 6.0.

Enhancement:
* Added multiple positions for Notice bars.
* Added varieties of configurations for each sections like width, color etc.
* Added Enable/Disable option for each sections.
* Added hide/unhide option for each sections for mobile.
* Added total 8 types of Notice bars.
* Added multiple close actions with cookie timer.
* Added scheduling option for Notice bars.
* Added animations for the plain text Notice.
* Added subscription form with subscribers list.
* Added option to hide/unhide number of tweets and profile picture for Twitter tweets.
* Sliding news ticker with multiple configurations.
* Added page display control for individual Notice bars.
* Added separate settings page with debug mode enable/disable option.
* Shortcodes support.

2.1.0

Release Date: 1st February, 2022

  • Compatibility tested with WordPress 5.9.

2.0.9

Release Date: 28th December, 2021

  • Compatibility tested with WordPress 5.8.2.

2.0.8

  • Compatibility testing with WordPress version 5.3.

2.0.7

  • Test compatibility.

2.0.6

  • Font size option and ticker bug has been removed.
  • Did Small CSS fixing.
  • Fixes : Minor settings issue.
  • Tested Upto WordPress 5.2.2

2.0.5

  • Font size option has been removed.
  • POT file added.
  • Compatibility testing with WordPress version 4.6.1.

2.0.4

  • Added body class on notice-bar open and close conditions.

2.0.3

  • Removed functionality before v2.0.0. Backup your files and database before switching into latest version.

2.0.2

  • Added tabs functionality
  • Reduced width of the option field

2.0.1

  • Fixed Slider layout issue for version 2.0.1
  • Fixed few css issue
  • Added Debug Mode

2.0.0

  • Updated with major change in UI
  • Added new options such as news ticker, slider and social icons
  • Added different styling options such as background color, font color, social icons color, social icons color hover, anchor links color, anchor links color on hover
  • Added Settings section to switch between new and old version

1.0.0

  • Initial release
